works.description: My blog post "Partitioning Hard Drive in Windows 7 Without Formatting" is infringed by the text excerpted on the site, beginning with the text "With the advent of the technical world comes new operating systems each with some more facilities than its predecessor. The same happened with Windows. Recent operating systems like Windows 7 and also Windows Vista has a great dexterity in them that the Hard Disk can be partitioned, re-sized without formatting your computer. Here we discuss how to perform this act in Windows 7."
